price: 39. Mise waxaad naga heysataan ballan Xaggayaga ah lagu adkeeyey dhaar gaaraysa ilaa Maalinta Qiyaamaha inaad heleysaan waxaad doontaanba?
arabic: أَمۡ لَكُمۡ أَيۡمَٰنٌ عَلَيۡنَا بَٰلِغَةٌ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ إِنَّ لَكُمۡ لَمَا تَحۡكُمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: am lakum aymānun ʿalaynā bālighatun ilā yawmi al-qiyāmati inna lakum lamā taḥkumūna
